overview: There is a 90-year-old aging bag. There are two hometowns in his life. He was born in Korea, which gave him the dream of becoming a painter, and France, which allowed him to complete the inspiration of the artist into painting. After 40 years of living in France, the painter decides to live in Korea for the rest of his life. And he goes on a long journey to end his life in France. However, he finds out that returning to Korea, where he was born, is ultimately to face his own death.
title: Mask and Mirror
